DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers recruit Lebanese American University campus . Those fit inclusion criterion allow choose two arm : invasive non-invasive procedure . Volunteers choose enroll non-invasive arm give study product directly complete GERD Q questionnaire . A follow-up phone do day 0 , 3 , 6 11 . GERD Q questionnaire repeat day 11 28 along satisfaction rating . Adverse event report log sheet . Concerning invasive arm , volunteer give appointment Lebanese American University Medical Center Rizk Hospital place 24h pH-metry , study product administer . After 7-10 day , 24h pH monitoring do .
